text.headline: Senior Software Engineer (Observability Team)
text.text: PIC for Grab’s logging stack – Manage >1PiB Opensearch clusters and logging pipeline.

text.headline: Backend Software Engineer Intern (Payments Team)
text.text:
• Instrumented service with Prometheus metrics to trace performance bottlenecks.
  • Developed pre-deployment validation for stored credentials of partner APIs

text.headline: Full Stack Software Engineer Intern (Drivers Team)
text.text: Designed and built a 2-way cross-platform messaging system for communication during parcel delivery.

text.headline: DevOps / SRE Intern
text.text:
• Developed release package upload tool for Forward Deploy Engineers to install packages on customers' VMs
  • Oversaw Nginx version upgrade and configurations for enabling Modsecurity WAF

text.headline: Backend Software Engineer Intern (Shippers Team)
text.text: Developed a webhook history tool to allow tracking and searching of fired webhooks.
